Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2010 02:06AM janetribble wrote: Ask them for Zometa. This is a bisphosphonate. Trials going on in the States show up to 35% effectiveness working in the bone marrow. I am on a crusade to get this drug more widely used - it's a significant step; originally developed for osteoporosis. You can only ask. J xxx
